= Introduction =

Javascript Debug Toolkit is a eclips plugin used to debug javascript cross browser.


= How to install =
    Javascript Debug Toolkit requires jre 1.5+ and  eclipse 3.2+ to install.
    Download the jsdt-1.0.0.zip to your computer and unzip to eclipse's home directory.
    Restart eclipse and you can use Javascript Debug Toolkit.
